features: The kid's tablet for toddlers that parents love: The new Android kid's tablet for kids ages 3-7 is 25% faster with dual 1: 1: 1: cameras, easy parental controls, a 7-inch HD display, and a child-resistant, durable case with kickstand to withstand children's adventures, and the kid's tablet comes with 32GB of storage so your child has the opportunity to explore and learn and play in a safe environment. opportunity to explore, learn and play in a safe and secure environment.

Kids tablet, will this Android tablet pre-installed with Google iKids has a variety of kids APPs, 32GB ROM and up to 128GB TF card expandable memory can help your child to store a lot of favorite cartoons, online reading, songs and photos. Android 11 Let Netflix, Disney+, Hulu, ABC Mouse and more run smoothly on your kids' tablet!

EYE-FRIENDLY KIDS' TABLET: The 7-inch Kids' Tablet features a 1024 x 600 HD display touchscreen with wide viewing angles and vibrant colors, so your child can watch videos on our Kids' Tablet anytime, anywhere. The screen will automatically adjust the brightness for a comfortable reading experience. Parents can also set the screen time to ensure that their child doesn't spend too much time watching the toddler tablet.

POWERFUL PARENTAL CONTROLS: The upload app that comes with our kids tablets designed for kids ages 2-5 allows you to create your own customized parental controls. You can set rules for your child's tablet, such as daily screen time limits, restricting access to specific apps, and filtering inappropriate content. You can make sure your child is only exposed to age-appropriate content and approve app store requests

Perfect Gift and After-sales Service This Google Tablet has excellent performance, with a large 3000mAh battery for up to 6 hours of video time, and 32GB of extra memory for your kids' daily needs, making it the perfect choice for Christmas and birthdays. We guarantee to provide 2 years warranty and 30 days free return and exchange service. Please contact us on Amazon order page.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent for a cheap tablet! Great for a toddlers first tablet!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It’s a nice little basic tablet for a toddler. It slow here and there. But once you get the videos going, it doesn’t seem to slow. Blippi videos seem low quality. But my 2 yr old could careless. Super simple song videos seem good. The volume isn’t awesome. But again. My two yr old doesn’t know. For the price. I think it’s been pretty nice. We don’t let him sit on it all day every day. So it should last a bit. Hopefully nice for car rides! We will see during Christmas haha!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY, THIS PRODUCT IS GARBAGE
reviews.reviewText: If I could leave this product 0 stars I would. I purchased this product a month and a half ago against my better judgement and it did not work. I then reached out to the seller to see if I could get a replacement because it didn't work, and they said they would send me a replacement. After waiting a month for the replacement and not seeing anything, I reached out to the seller they had still not shipped the product. Once I finally received the product after they shipped it a month after they said they would, the product I received also did not work. Their customer service and products are absolutely terrible. This gets zero stars from me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tablet for kids at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Item shipped fast and as described. Great kids tablet with an easy app to help parents keep their kids safe and monitor what they get access to. Case is well made and has already been tested a few times. Wish I would've bought 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not 5G and I can't connect to my wifi changed band to 4g still no find the wifi

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great starter tablet for kids. I had a problem with the first one I purchased but I contacted customer support and they sent me a new one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Battery dies fast
reviews.reviewText: Battery dies really fast and it likes to freeze.

reviews.reviewText: Muy buen producto como lo mire así yego Muy bien

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just no. Worst purchase iv ever made. It doesn't work, all of it lags, the touchscreen doesn't work you have to turn it off and back on just to get it to function. Nothing like saving to get my kid the only thing he really wanted for Christmas just to have it not work. 😒
